page.title: 07Our Parish Priest
page.content: Fr. Breandan McDonald has been at Holy Family Parish since 1967 when he was asked by the Bishop to leave his job as a curate of St. Joseph's, Sale and start a new parish of Holy Family. As there was already a school in the parish, Father McDonald's first job was to find himself somewhere to live. He bought no. 65 Old Hall Road, a house facing the school and with the help of the parishioners set up a presbytery in September 1967. During the following years Father McDonald again with the help of the parishioners organized many social events in order to raise money for the building of a new church which was opened in December 1975.
